visual_events.description: The video starts with a POV shot from someone holding a wooden beam, showing a construction site with a concrete slab foundation and some wooden framing already up.
The person is looking down a ladder and then climbing up some wooden framing.
A worker in a neon yellow shirt and black vest appears, holding a tool. The camera pans around the wooden framework.
The person picks up a long wooden beam and carries it.
The person starts using a nail gun on a wooden beam on the frame.
The camera is focused on the nail gun as it shoots a nail into the wood.
The person in neon yellow gives the nail gun to the person filming.
The person in neon yellow takes the nail gun back and climbs down the ladder.
The person is nailing a long wooden beam.
The person uses the nail gun to secure a connection on the wooden frame.
The person in neon yellow brings over a metal truss piece.
The person marks measurements on the wooden beam using the tape.
The person uses a speed square to mark a perpendicular line on the wood.
The person with the camera grabs the measuring tape.
The person marks the beam with a marker.
The person marks a large 'X' on the beam.
The person marks the beam with a speed square.
The person in neon yellow picks up a large metal truss.
The worker in neon yellow starts placing the truss on the frame.
The worker in neon yellow carries the truss over to the frame.
The worker holds the truss in place.
The worker in neon yellow is attaching the truss using a drill.
The camera shows the drill screwing a fastener into the wood.
The drill is screwing a fastener into the truss.
The camera pans to show the drilling process.
The worker lifts a yellow laminated veneer lumber (LVL) beam.
The worker lifts the LVL beam higher.
The worker drills a fastener into the LVL beam.
The drill is screwing a fastener into the LVL beam.
The worker uses a speed square and marks the LVL beam.
The worker drills a fastener into the LVL beam.
The worker helps adjust a new truss.
The worker drills a fastener into the truss.
